search_results.title: TLW's World War II Historyscope - The Historyscoper

question: (Sarah of the Clue Crew reports from inside a B-17.)  Because of its heavy defensive armament, including .50 caliber machine guns, the B-17 was dubbed the "Flying" this; Nazi propaganda tried to change that to "Flying Coffin"
